events.message: The insured reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th, involving significant front-end damage.
Based on the initial report, the claim has been categorized as an Auto Accident type due to the vehicle collision described.
An agent has been assigned to assist the insured with the vehicle damage claim and guide them through the process.
The insurance company has formally acknowledged the receipt of the claim and assured the insured of timely assistance.
Request was made for relevant documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and driver's license.
The insured submitted all requested documents, including detailed photos of the damaged vehicle and the official police report.
The investigation team has initiated a thorough examination of the collision circumstances and liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded affirming the insured is not at fault and damage costs are consistent with the estimate provided.
A settlement offer was prepared and proposed to cover the full cost of repairs for the vehicle damage.
The insured confirmed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the efficient claim handling.
The claim has been officially approved, granting authorization for the payment to cover the vehicle repairs.
The settlement payment was successfully issued to the insured's bank account for coverage of the accident-related damages.
The claim case is now closed after full payment, with no further disputes or issues reported by the insured.
The entire case file, including all documents and correspondence, has been archived for future reference.
